scripts.all: npm run husky && npm run lint && npm run branch && npm run commit
scripts.husky: cd - && npx husky-init && npm install && sed -i -e 's/npm test//g' .husky/pre-commit && cd ..
scripts.lint: cd - && sed -i -e 's/npm run lint//g' .husky/pre-commit && npx husky add .husky/pre-commit 'npm run lint'
scripts.branch: cd - && sed -i -e 's/npx validate-branch-name//g' .husky/pre-commit && npx husky add .husky/pre-commit 'npx validate-branch-name' && cp -v husky-config/.validate-branch-namerc.json .validate-branch-namerc.json
scripts.commit: cd - && npm install --save-dev @commitlint/config-conventional @commitlint/cli && cp -v husky-config/commitlint.config.cjs commitlint.config.cjs && npx husky add .husky/commit-msg  'npx --no -- commitlint --edit ${1}'
scripts.other-all: npm run other-husky && npm run other-lint && npm run other-branch && npm run other-commit
scripts.other-lint: cd ..  && npx husky add .husky/pre-commit "npm run lint"
scripts.other-branch: cd ..  && npx husky add .husky/pre-commit "npx validate-branch-name" && copy .\husky-config\.validate-branch-namerc.json .validate-branch-namerc.json
scripts.other-commit: cd .. &&  npm install --save-dev @commitlint/config-conventional @commitlint/cli && copy .\husky-config\commitlint.config.cjs commitlint.config.cjs && npx husky add .husky/commit-msg  "npx --no -- commitlint --edit ${1}"
